exitComplete.description: Function called when the animation ends in the closed state.

openChange.description: Function called when the popup is opened

update:open.description: Event handler called when the open state of the collapsible changes.

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the collapsible when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; content: string; trigger: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the collapsible. Useful for composition.

open.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Can be binded with v-model.
